Luca Cucina Italiana
Serving traditional Italian cuisine since 2011
Ciao!
Since opening in 2011 in Berkeley, Luca Cucina Italiana has become a neighborhood favorite for Italian cuisine. Within our first six months, we earned praise from top publications like the San Francisco Chronicle and Oakland Tribune, and also from our amazing community. Our secret? Simple: fresh, quality ingredients cooked with love and tradition.
Enjoy the best of local produce with our homemade pasta, sauces, sausage, meatballs, and more! Signature dishes like our gnocchi and lasagna, featuring our family's pomodoro sauce recipe from 1900, bring the taste of Italy straight to your table.
Affordable, authentic, and always welcoming, Luca offers a slice of Italian warmth right here in Berkeley.
Come join us!

Wine List
Rustic Italian cuisine with a contemporary twist,
featuring house made pastas & locally sourced seafood & meats.
Well-situated in Berkeley’s lively Elmwood district,
Donato & Co.
offers rustic Italian cuisine with a contemporary twist.
Chef Donato Scotti
has partnered with longtime friend
Chef Gianluca Guglielmi
to bring his fourth restaurant concept to the Bay Area.
Anchored by a warm and sophisticated setting with a natural and authentic Italian vibe, the dynamic menu reflects the chefs’ culinary philosophies of using fresh, simple ingredients in inventive ways, drawing upon each region of Italy with a sensibility only natives can express.
Join the Donato Wine Club
Thoughtfully curated wines monthly.
Travel the world of wine with us and enjoy exciting wine selections from small-producers, often allocated and always satisfying.
Subscribe

About the Business
Business owner information
Michelle C.
Manager
A contemporary, farm-to-table French restaurant influenced by California culinary cuisine. Inspiration at Julia's begins with the bounty of local and organic products available in the Bay Area and highlighted with French techniques. Combined with a beautiful atmosphere and friendly service, Julia's creates a memorable dining experience for all guests.

2,000 calories a day is used for general nutritional advice, but calorie needs vary. Notice: Before placing your order please inform your server of any food allergies. Despite our many efforts to
accommodate the dietary restrictions of our guests, we cannot guarantee that any of our dishes—including our “gluten free” items—are entirely free of allergens. All dishes are prepared made-
to-order in a common kitchen (including, where applicable, the same fryer), so all dishes are at risk of cross-contact and/or cross-contamination. Accordingly, guests must ultimately decide
whether a certain dish will meet their health needs.

Reviews

Review by - Google
five star review by
Chris M:
I've lived around here a decade and a half and I'm kicking myself that I haven't found this place sooner. Wow... just wow... breathtaking all the way around.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Liz M:
Great atmosphere.  Service was attentive and personal.  Soft shell crab sandwich was tender and the rigatoni full of flavor.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Lady T:
This restaurant is fabulous!... Great customers service,  EXCELLENT food, beautiful view and ample parking!... This is a MUST try restaurant whenever you're in Richmond.  You won't be disappointed!!👍🏾
Review by - Google
five star review by
Colleen W:
The service was quick and the food was outstanding.  The homemade fettuccine with prawns in white wine sauce was amazing.  The others in our party had similar raves on their dishes.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Christina D:
I had the fettuccine with prawns, and the sauce was sublime! The service was great as well. Unfortunately I was visiting from out of state and will sadly probably never get to enjoy dining at Lara's again. Highly recommend!!!!

What is Bottega
Online Pick Up Ordering Page
Catering
Special Events
Reservation
Gift Cards
News
Contact
ABOUT
What is Bottega
Belotti pasta shop
Same great flavor minus the reservation
The story
Belotti Bottega (Italian: shop) finishes the full circle for the Belotti. Before the birth of Belotti Ristorante on College Ave, Chef Belotti and wife Joyce were originally looking for a location for a quick service pasta shop, which was meant to focus on bringing their hearty pasta to an everyday casual spot. Serendipitously, they found the location for the "ristorante," but not the "bottega" until now. Belotti Bottega will serve as an outlet for Chef Belotti to make his flavor accessible to more people at home, at work, or at parties.
4001-B Piedmont Ave, Oakland, CA 94611
Monday-Saturday 11:00am - 8pm
510-350-7619
Current Menu Offering
Order Online
Want the convenience of ordering online and scheduling a ready time so you can just swing by the shop and pick up your items?
Order Online pick up
Order Food Delivery with DoorDash
Catering
We want to bring Belotti food to your homes, offices, and parties!
Each party is treated individually based on preferences. Chef Belotti will tailor a menu that suits your needs, please see our “
Catering
” page with more information and ;et us know what you need!
We offer a no-service catering option for lunch and dinner. The food is dropped off at the event location (if within 6 mile radius from Bottega) or picked up at our shop. Our food comes packaged in platters or aluminum food containers depending on items and usually paper napkins and disposable cutlery are included.
All catered events that require delivery are subject to a $25 transportation fee.
All catering requests need
48-hour advanced notice.
Fresh Pasta, Sauces, Spuntini
Belotti signature fresh pasta, along with customer's favorite sauces for at home recreation of Belotti flavor. In addition, Italian spuntini items for picnics, parties, or for just that "wine, salumi, and cheese" kind of night.
Eat In / Take Out
Agnolotti, Casoncelli, Pappardelle, etc. Favorites from Belotti Ristorante can now also be found at the Belotti Bottega location.
Top

Marinara topped with our four cheese blend of mozzarella, cheddar cheese, fontina, and Asiago cheese. 14 / 20
MERCURY V
Mozzarella and marinara topped with sliced tomatoes, garlic, and fresh basil. 14 / 20
GALILEO V
Olive oil crust topped with artichokes, mushrooms, garlic, spinach, fresh tomato, fontina and aged Asiago. 16 / 22
JUNO
Mozzarella and marinara topped with Nduja sausage, pickled jalapeños, red onions, and an oregano garnish. 20 / 26
CALLISTO V
Garlic sauce base, with kale, roasted carrots, beets, and delicata squash, chili flakes, lemon zest, mozzarella and Asiago. 18 / 24

Olive oil crust with mozzarella topped with thinly-sliced potatoes, bacon, ricotta cheese, red chili flakes, thyme, and rosemary. 16 / 22

ARIES
Mozzarella and marinara topped with pepperoni. 15 / 21

Garlic sauce base, with fontina, Asiago, and our house mushroom mix with cremini, portabella, and white mushrooms. 18 / 24

Smoked mozzarella and marinara topped with bacon, pork fennel sausage, pepperoni, and green onions. 20 / 26
CIRCE
Olive oil crust with mozzarella topped with shrimp, garlic, butter, green onion, red chili flakes, and cracked pepper. 22 / 28
GAIA
Olive oil crust with mozzarella topped with roasted chicken breast, spinach, mushrooms, roasted garlic, ricotta, and oregano. 18 / 24
CLASSIC VEGGIE V
Mozzarella and marinara topped with bell peppers, mushrooms, red onions, and olives. 15 / 21
IO
Pesto and mozzarella topped with roasted chicken, red onions, and olives. 18 / 24
APPETIZERS
V: VEGETARIAN  VG: VEGAN
GF: GLUTEN-FREE
BEER AND CHEESE FONDUE V
Made with our house lager, fontina, smoked mozzarella and roasted garlic. Served with your choice of sourdough, focaccia, or half of each. 11
ARTICHOKE & SPINACH DIP V
Creamy artichoke and spinach dip with garlic and herbs. Served with your choice of sourdough, focaccia, or half of each. 11
BRUSCHETTA V
Rustic Italian bread toasted and topped with marinated roma tomatoes, red onion, olive oil and aged Asiago cheese, topped with balsamic reduction. 10

BBQ PORK RIBLETS

MEDITERRANEAN OLIVES VG GF

CHEESY GARLIC BREAD

SALADS

Sm / Lg
HOUSE VG GF

Romaine hearts, wood-fired croutons, aged Asiago and Caesar dressing. 11 / 15

Romaine hearts, wood-fired croutons, artichokes, roasted red peppers, Kalamata olives, feta and champagne herb vinaigrette. 13 / 17
BEET V GF
Organic mixed greens, beets, shaved fennel, oranges, shredded carrots, Chenel goat cheese, candied walnuts, and champagne herb vinaigrette. 14 / 18
CAPRESE V GF
Fresh roma tomatoes, basil, and fresh mozzarella, served on a bed of mixed greens tossed in a balsamic vinaigrette. 13 / 17

SANDWICHES

MEATBALL

ACHIOTE CHICKEN

CAPRESE
Fresh tomato, basil, fresh mozzarella, and pesto garlic aioli on ciabatta. 13
NEPTUNA MELT
Albacore tuna salad, roasted red peppers, and mozzarella. Served open-face on focaccia. 14

name: ZINO
raw_text:
Dinner Menu Greece
Spreads
(served with flatbread) Flavors of Greece
Charred Eggplant & Garbanzo - Aleppo Oil, lemon, nigella 12 Located in the heart of the Mediterranean Sea, Greece is within the nucleus of
Mediterranean cuisine. Greek cuisine is characterized by its frugality and was founded
Muhammara - piquillo peppers, walnuts, pomegranate molasses 12
on the "Mediterranean Triad": wheat, olive oil, and wine, with meat being rarely eaten
and fish being more common. Four times a year, we honor a region within the
Labneh - fresh cucumber, dill & chive oil 12
Mediterranean and invite you to explore with us. Earlier this year, we celebrated Sicily
Trio of Spreads - a sampler of all three dips 15 and the Maghreb Region. Today, we introduce you to Greece.
Appetizers and Salads Savory
Caesar Salad - Reggiano, croutons, avocado, Za'atar, tahini dressing 15 Xoriatiki - marinated feta, early girl tomatoes, cucumber, red onion,
add marinated anchovy 4 add chicken 6 lemon, extra-virgin olive oil 12

served with toasted bread 12

Our menu changes quite often depending on what inspirations we find at the farmer's market or while foraging through the garden.  Nonetheless, we have our core menu available.

It is most cost effective to place a phone order with our friendly staff for pickup-we don't mind going out in our jammies either 8)

About the Business
The Crepevine was built and created by our family to be a gathering place for families, friends, professionals and students. In our menu, you will always find something exciting to eat; and certainly, our youngest guests will never be disappointed. At the Crepevine we take great pride in providing the freshest, healthiest, ingredients we can buy, such as organic, fair-trade coffee, ocean raised Canadian salmon, and 100% natural beef that has never been given any antibiotics or hormones. Most of our fruits and vegetables are purchased from local farmers and growers. We use 100% Grade A pure maple syrup. All of our dressings and sauces are made from scratch in our own kitchen, including our pancake mix.

Did you know? We opened a bottle shop next door. Come say hello! 🍾
Visit the bottle shop
Welcome to Prizefighter Bar!
Join us for a cocktail, beer, wine, or something from our extensive selection of spirits at the bar or on our spacious covered patio.
🍕 B.Y.O.F. 🥟
We serve tamales and chips but do not have a kitchen and are not a restaurant. You are always welcome to bring in outside food.
Reservations are definitely not required but we are happy to set aside space for larger groups. Book a table for groups of 6-8 people on Resy.com by clicking the link below.
       
Looking to reserve space for an even larger group? Or book the bar for a private event? Either way, shoot us an email to info@prizefighterbar.com and we'll send you the details.
Make a reservation

We have our a la carte menu available TUES-THURS and a 4 course (72/person) prix fixe menu only FRI & SAT (however, you can always order a la carte at our bar!) Executive
Chef: Eric Tucker
Sous Chef: Tyler Jaye
Since 1994 Millennium has been committed to providing fresh, innovative vegan cuisine. Millennium offers globally inspired plant-based fare in an inviting fine dining setting. Working with small farms, our menu changes constantly to showcase the finest local, sustainable, and organic produce at its peak. Thoughtfully blending flavors from around the world with classic techniques, we create vibrant dishes that are exciting to diners of all kinds. Our bar features inventive cocktails highlighting our house-made infusions and fresh juices, as well as craft beers and an internationally recognized wine list.

Welcome to Very Lao Table style.
When I was young This kind of food, this kind of setup was for the whole family. This is meant to be shared for hands use.
Hand to mouth is one of the things that is only shared between friend and family.
The reason I brought Lao Table to San Francisco and the bay area here is because I believe in the power of family. What I believe in life
is to share and this type of food, you don't see much here in state. It's only local people as a Thai culture especially family you know,
sit down, enjoy the food and have fun using your hands. You don't care who you are eating with, but you do care about is the
conversation over the table. This is family.
Chef Kasem Saengsawang
Chef Owner at Farmhouse Kitchen Thai | San Francisco | Oakland | Portland & Daughter Thai Kitchen
Michelin's Bib Gourmand 2016, 2017, 2018 and 2019

About the Business
We are a Taiwanese restaurant  on a mission to build an inclusive and caring community through food. We have been dedicating ourselves to pairing fine-dining quality, artisanal food with a personable hospitality. 
​
In our menu, you will see thoughtful use of seasonal ingredients and specialty Taiwanese imports. Through our focus on technique and process, we strive to elevate both humble family stables and banquet dishes for our guests seeking Taiwanese flavors.
​
After five years of pop-up around the Bay Area, we settled in our new home in Emeryville. Now, we are excited to offer you a daily rotating food and sake pairing menu inspired by the flavors we miss dearly.

You might be hearing about us from our popup earlier feature dumplings, now, with our new brick n motar restaurant, we have transformed ourselves to offer Taiwanese cuisine and Taiwanese flavor-inspired dishes .  We welcome you to our new home and new menu .

About the Business
~Our Story~
-At Seabreeze on the Dock, quality seafood meets environmental sustainability.
-We want you to enjoy our food in the now and in the years to come which is why we source responsibly.
-By partnership up with wild-caught fisheries and fish farms that share and meet these same values and standards.
-Also by supporting local suppliers in our own backyard, we commit to serving sustainable seafood and reducing our carbon footprints.
-So, as you relax and enjoy the quality seafood with the view or the Oakland Waterfront, you can do so with an eased conscience, knowing that, here, we strive to uphold the most environmentally responsible practices for you, for us, and for this who will come after us.

name: Shan Dong
raw_text:
Shan Dong Menu – Updated September 2025
Home
Gallery

Work Hours
Business info

Shan Dong Menu (Updated September 2025)
Welcome to Shan Dong, a hidden gem nestled in Oakland, California. This delightful Chinese restaurant has quickly earned a loyal following for its dedication to authentic flavors and sustainable practices, highlighted by hand-pulled noodles that elevate any dish they touch.
The menu at Shan Dong is a treasure trove of culinary delights. Start your meal with the famous
Shan Dong Chicken
, a crispy creation beloved by regulars. For those craving something hearty, the
Egg Foo Young
selections—ranging from
Scallop
to
Vegetarian
—offer layers of flavor for every palate.
Beef dishes:
Dive into the
Hunan Spicy Sauce Beef
or the comforting
Beef with Bean Curd
for a satisfying experience.
Dumplings:
These are truly the stars of the show, bursting with flavor and perfect when paired with chili oil.
Vegetable offerings:
The crunchy
Green Beans
and
Eggplant
shine on their own, rich in freshness and flavor.
With a cozy atmosphere and attentive service, Shan Dong is perfect for a quick lunch or a leisurely dinner. Whether you're a spice lover or seeking comforting classics, the inviting dishes here will keep you coming back for more. Don’t miss out on trying the
hand-pulled noodles
—they are a game-changer that will leave your taste buds craving even more.

name: Vanessa's Bistro
raw_text:
Vanessa's Bistro - Berkeley | Vietnamese Tapas with a French twist!
|
|
|
With my experience in this field of fine dining and great wines, I would like to share the art of food preparation, ingredients, and incorporate it into my very own cuisine. The food will strongly be defined by many cultural inheritances, all while borrowing ingredients and techniques from all over the world, and integrating it into my cooking style. I want to share my passion and creation with people. I love what I do, to me itâs more than just a job, it is a life style. My passion for food and romance for flavors will always be a big part of me, and I hope to share it with all of youâ¦Enjoy!
Vanessa Dang
Executive Chef

About the Business
Established in 1975, Arinell Pizza has been Berkeley's go-to spot for authentic New York-style slices for generations. Famous for our thin, crispy crust and mouthwatering pies, every slice delivers a nostalgic taste of old-school NYC. Whether you prefer it plain, loaded with toppings, or Sicilian-style, our pizzas are handcrafted using traditional recipes and the freshest ingredients. Grab a slice and taste why we've been a local favorite for nearly five decades!
…
Read more
Ask the Community
Ask a question
Q:
I was wondering who owns Arinells pizza now, one person, a family?
A:
Ron Demirdjian is the sole owner and one of the original owners. It was originally owned by Ron and Larry (R and L).  I don't recall Larry's last name but he's been gone since the 1970s I think.
H M.

Weekday Happy Hour
Weekdays 3:00pm to 5:30pm
Dine-In Only. No substitutions.
Drink Specials-
All house cocktails $9
All draft beers $7
All glasses of wine $2 off
Small Bites-
Caesar Salad $7
Zachary’s Meatballs $9.25
Lunch Specials
Personal Stuffed or Thin pizzas are available Mon-Fri 11-4pm. Short on time? Call your personal pizza in ahead of time so it’s ready when you arrive! Want to make it a full meal? Add a side Caesar salad and fountain soda or iced tea for $5.50 plus tax.
Zachary's Chicago Style Stuffed Pizza
Our stuffed specialty. We literally “stuff” each pizza with the highest quality cheese and toppings that you choose. The stuffed pizza “pie” is then covered with our zesty diced tomato sauce and baked until the buttery crust is golden brown. Choose from our list of “favorites” or create your own!
Zachary's Thin Style Pizza
A great choice for those who want a more traditional style pizza. Our buttery crust is rolled to a moderate thickness and dusted with cornmeal. Choose from our list of “favorites” or create your own!
Half-Baked Pizzas
Planning an event, need to feed a hungry family, or just want to avoid the crowds? Zachary’s recommends ordering your pizzas half-baked to finish cooking at home. All pizzas are available half-baked.
Dining In
Indoor dining is available. Reservations are available for parties of 6 or fewer guests and can be made
here
.
Walk-ins are always accepted! If there is a wait for tables when you arrive,
you will be able to order your pizzas once you have been added to the waitlist. For more information please call (510) 658-3226.
Other Information
18% gratuity added to parties of 7 or more. $12 corkage fee
Vegan Pizza Option
Ask about our vegan pizza option made with our vegan wheat crust.
Prep and cooking surfaces are not dairy-free or meat-free.
Gluten Free Thin-Crust Pizza
GLUTEN-FREE THIN-CRUST PIZZA (11”)
Cheese: $18.50 / Additional veggie/cheese topping: $2.45 / Additional meat topping: $3.10
Our gluten-free pizza crust is supplied by a bakery. Gluten-free crust will soften quickly and is best consumed immediately after baking. The taste, texture, and browning characteristics will differ from a Zachary’s stuffed or thin pizza. If you are gluten intolerant please be advised that your pizzas will be prepared and cooked on surfaces with exposure to wheat flour.

GoTab - Order, Pay & Go!
Quick Spot Selection
Order, Pay & Go!
GoTab is a Restaurant Commerce Platform (RCP) used by large- and mid-sized restaurants, breweries, bars, and hotels. GoTab uniquely allows patrons to order and pay through a server (old school), or directly from their own mobile phones (contactless ordering and payment - new school), or blend the two experiences all on one tab, through its easy-to-use mobile point-of-sale (POS), contactless ordering and payment features, and kitchen management systems (KMS). The guest never has to download an app or create a password. For more info visit
gotab.io/en
GoTab cannot Go!
In order to work, GoTab needs cookies and Javascript to be enabled on your browser. It is also possible that cookies are not being stored / transmitted by your browser because we require secure connections via HTTPS.

*We offer togo Party Size salads. Party sizes serve 6-10 adults and are $29.25. Add free-range chicken breast to any party salad for an additional $15.25. Party Size salads are not available for dine-in.
Zachary's Chicago Style Stuffed Pizza
Our stuffed specialty. We literally “stuff” each pizza with the highest quality cheese and toppings that you choose. The stuffed pizza “pie” is then covered with our zesty diced tomato sauce and baked until the buttery crust is golden brown. Choose from our list of “favorites” or create your own!
Zachary's Thin Style Pizza
A great choice for those who want a more traditional style pizza. Our buttery crust is rolled to a moderate thickness and dusted with cornmeal. Choose from our list of “favorites” or create your own!
Half-Baked Pizzas
Planning an event, need to feed a hungry family, or just want to avoid the crowds? Zachary’s recommends ordering your pizzas half-baked to finish cooking at home. All pizzas are available half-baked.
Lunch Options
Looking for a quick and easy option for lunch?
Thin-crust Slices are available daily from 11:00-3:00! Your choice of Cheese for $6.25 or Pepperoni, Veggie, or Sausage for $6.75.
Make it a complete meal and get a Lunch Special for $12.75! Includes a slice, side Caesar salad, and a fountain soda or iced tea. All prices are before tax.
Dining In
Indoor dining is available. Seating is first come, first served on Friday evenings and Saturday all day. For all other times, a limited number of reservations for parties of 6 or fewer guests can be made
here
.
Walk-ins are always accepted! If there is a wait for tables when you arrive,
you will be able to order your pizzas once you have been added to the waitlist. For more information please call (510) 525-5950.
Other Information
18% gratuity added to parties of 7 or more. $12 corkage fee
Vegan Pizza Option
Ask about our vegan pizza option made with our vegan wheat crust.
Prep and cooking surfaces are not dairy-free or meat-free.
Gluten Free Thin-Crust Pizza
GLUTEN-FREE THIN-CRUST PIZZA (11”)
Cheese: $18.50 / Additional veggie/cheese topping: $2.45 / Additional meat topping: $3.10
Our gluten-free pizza crust is supplied by a bakery. Gluten-free crust will soften quickly and is best consumed immediately after baking. The taste, texture, and browning characteristics will differ from a Zachary’s stuffed or thin pizza. If you are gluten intolerant please be advised that your pizzas will be prepared and cooked on surfaces with exposure to wheat flour.
ZACHARY’S SALADS & STARTERS
Zachary’s Meatballs
Three house-made meatballs in marinara, garnished with aged parmesan and served with focaccia breadsticks
$12.75
Caesar
Romaine lettuce tossed with Zachary’s Caesar dressing, croutons, and aged parmesan

Single $8.25 – Shared/Entrée $16.25
Garden

Single $8.25 – Shared/Entrée $16.25
Spinach
Baby spinach, feta cheese, croutons, red onion, and tomatoes (bacon optional)
Single $8.25 – Shared/Entrée $16.25
Arugula
Arugula, Fuji apples, fennel, champagne vinaigrette and shaved Parmesan
Single $8.25 – Shared/Entrée $16.25

name: Hopkins Street Bakery
raw_text:
Hopkins Street Bakery | Desserts
Hopkins Street Bakery
1584 Hopkins St, Berkeley, CA 94707
|  (510) 526-8188  |  Open Mon–Sun | 7am–6pm
Desserts
Eclair
— Declared the âBest in Townâ by many of our customers. Filled with light custard cream, topped with dark chocolate. A definite must try!
Cupcakes
— Light and fluffy chocolate cake topped with our rich “fudgy” chocolate ganache in the chocolate version. On weekends, we also offer other seasonal flavors like strawberries, vanilla, red velvet, etc.
Brownie
— Our very “fudgy” recipe with a blend of dark and milk chocolate, coffee and big chunks of walnuts.
Seasonal Fruit Tart
— Homemade buttery tart shell filled with homemade pastry cream topped with seasonal fruits. A healthy and light dessert.
Lemon Tart
— Homemade buttery tart shell filled with homemade lemon curd made from fresh squeezed lemon juice.
Almond Tart
— Our buttery tart shell filled with homemade freshly grounded almond paste baked with fresh fruits.
French Pear Tart
— Homemade buttery tart shell filled with homemade pastry cream topped with beautifully arranged pear that is soaked in French red wine and cranberry juice.
Creme Caramel/Flan/Custard
— Our classic custard made from eggs with sweet caramel that is very silky in taste.
Bomboloni (Saturday Special)
— The most popular dessert item on Saturday!!  A sweet brioche dough that is deep fried and filled with our famous pastry custard cream and lightly coated with powdered sugar. A real treat for the weekend!
Cannoli (special order)
— A classic cannoli of ricotta cheese, flavored with orange juice and garnished with candied fruit.

IB’s Cheesesteaks Favorites
What’s Trending At Our Cheesesteak Shop?
Fried Chicken Sando
Are you in the mood for chicken? If so, our tasty variety of IB chicken items are extreme crowd pleasers. Especially our delicious Fried Chicken Sando!
ORDER NOW
Steak Fries
Seriously, we make the tastiest and best steak fries Oakland and Berkeley can cook up! What’s even better? We also provide fries catering to accommodate large parties!
ORDER NOW
Avogobble
Our Avogobble is the epitome of a turkey avocado sandwich! You’ll get a perfect balance of taste and texture in this avocado turkey sandwich.
ORDER NOW
WE SHOW LOVE TO THE BAY!
IB’s Oakland & Berkely Collabs
To honor our roots, we wanted to do something special. So, we made cheesesteaks inspired by some of The Bay Area’s very own legends – Cookies Berner and Marshawn Lynch. Try them TODAY!
Halal Menu
Juicy Cheesesteak
Burgers, Fries, & More!
Picture this, you’re walking down the street, stomach growling as you’re craving a mouthwatering meal. All of a sudden, the thought “where can I get the best chicken cheesesteak near me” enters your mind. Then out of nowhere, an amazing aroma of sizzling onions and tender chicken begins wafting through the air, luring you to follow the scent. You turn the corner, and right before your very eyes is an IB’s restaurant. In that very moment you realize, your wonderful craving has been delightfully answered!
At IB‘s Oakland and Berkeley cheesesteak shops, thats the feeling you get when walking in. Whether you’re in the mood for a cheesesteak, hoagie and burger, or even wings, we got delicious taste waiting for you. Needless to say our community loves our food, especially our great steak and hoagie sandwiches! So why not indulge in a delectable meal that you cannot find anywhere else? Not to mention, we also have tasty lamb options so you can enjoy our take on a halal Philly cheese steak!
Order Online
Reward Yourself
GET 10% OFF
Join our LOYALTY REWARDS program and GET 10% OFF your first order! Don’t miss out on EXCLUSIVE offers, collabs, new items, and more!

We love big flavors at District. Come in to District and see what Executive Chef Bob Cina has on the menu. Our dinner menu specializes in small plates or tapas, artisan pizza, ahi poke, oysters, cheese & charcuterie and more.  Everything is designed to be shared and paired with our extensive wine and whiskey offering.

name: El Talpense Mexican Restaurant
raw_text:
Menu - El Talpense Mexican Restaurant
Home
Menu
About us
Locations
Menu
Menu
Home
Menu
Home
Menu
About us
Locations
Delicious
Our Menu
Welcome to El Talpense Mexican Restaurant! We have a fantastic selection of recipes prepared with traditional Mexican ingredients. Try our delicious tacos, enchiladas, burritos, quesadillas, and more. For those looking for a vegetarian-friendly option, we have plenty of delicious dishes for you to enjoy.
Appetizers
Sopas y Ensaladas
A La Carte
Fajitas
House Specialities
Mariscos
Vegan
Kids Menu
Beverages
Cervesas
Desserts
Cocktails
Appetizers
Combo Appetizer
$19.00
🧀 Combo Appetizer
Cheese Quesadilla, Nachitos, Chimichangitas, Sour Cream and Guacamole.
A perfect sampler for sharing (or not!), our Combo Appetizer includes a crispy cheese quesadilla, golden nachitos topped with melted cheese, and mini chimichangitas filled with savory goodness. Served with cool sour cream and fresh guacamole on the side, this platter brings together bold flavors and crunchy textures for the ultimate start to any meal.
Order now
Nachos
$12.00
A hearty twist on a classic favorite—crispy tortilla chips layered with refried beans and melted cheese, then topped with fresh jalapeños, diced onions, ripe tomatoes, and creamy avocado. Bold, satisfying, and perfect for sharing.
Order now
Nachos Grande
$18.00
A fiesta on a platter! Our Nachos Grande starts with a bed of crisp tortilla chips layered with refried beans and melted cheese, then loaded with your choice of savory ground beef, shredded chicken, picadillo, carne asada, carnitas al pastor, or melted cheese. Topped with diced onions, tomatoes, jalapeños, creamy guacamole, and cool sour cream, it’s a bold, shareable appetizer—or a full meal on its own
Order now
Asada Fries
$18.00
Golden French fries piled high and smothered with tender grilled carne asada, melted cheese, fresh diced tomatoes, chopped onions, and spicy jalapeños. Topped with creamy guacamole and a dollop of sour cream for the perfect balance of flavor and heat. A bold and satisfying favorite you won’t want to share!
Order now
Ceviche
$18.00
White Shrimp, Lemon Juice, Cucumber, Pico de Gallo, Avocado.
Refreshing and zesty, our shrimp ceviche features tender white shrimp marinated in freshly squeezed lemon juice, mixed with crisp cucumber, vibrant pico de gallo, and creamy avocado. A bright and satisfying seafood dish bursting with bold, citrusy flavor—perfect as a starter or a light entrée.
Order now
Mini Flautas
$14.00
Crispy, golden corn tortillas rolled and filled with your choice of tender shredded chicken or seasoned picadillo. Served with fresh cheese, creamy guacamole, sour cream, and crisp shredded lettuce for a crunchy, flavorful bite in every piece. A classic favorite, made mini and perfect for sharing—or not!
Order now
Guacamole
$12.00
Avocado, Onion and Lime. Guacamole
A simple, fresh blend of creamy avocado, finely chopped onion, and a splash of zesty lime juice. Smooth, vibrant, and made to order—perfect as a dip, side, or topping.
Order now
Cheese Quesadilla
$11.00
Giant Flour Tortilla and Monterey Jack Cheese
Cheese Quesadilla
A giant flour tortilla grilled to golden perfection and stuffed with melted Monterey Jack cheese. Crisp on the outside, gooey on the inside—this classic comfort dish is perfect on its own or as a cheesy side to any meal
Order now
Fajita Quesadilla
$19.00
A giant grilled flour tortilla loaded with melted Monterey Jack cheese and your choice of tender grilled chicken, juicy steak, or a mouthwatering combo. Stuffed with sautéed bell peppers and onions, then served with creamy guacamole and cool sour cream on the side. A bold, cheesy twist on classic fajitas—crispy, savory, and made to satisfy.
Order now
Chimichangitas
$13.00
Miniature flour tortillas rolled and lightly fried to a golden crisp, filled with your choice of savory chicken, seasoned picadillo, or mixed vegetables. Served with cool sour cream and fresh guacamole on the side. Crunchy on the outside, warm and flavorful on the inside—perfect as a snack or starter.
Order now
Sopas y Ensaladas
Garden Salad
$10.00
A fresh, crisp mix of greens topped with juicy tomato, sliced red onion, cool cucumber, and shredded carrot. Light, vibrant, and perfect as a starter or a refreshing side.
Order now
Taco salad bowl
$17.00
Taco Salad Bowl – A crisp tortilla bowl filled with your choice of Ground Beef, Picadillo, Chicken, or Mixed Vegetables, layered with fresh lettuce, shredded cheese, creamy guacamole, house-made pico de gallo, and a dollop of sour cream. Bold, fresh, and satisfying—perfectly packed with flavor.
Order now
Tostada Salad
$17.00
Tostada Salad – A crispy fried flour tortilla layered with refried beans, melted cheese, and your choice of Ground Beef, Picadillo, Chicken, or Mixed Vegetables. Topped with fresh lettuce, diced tomato, avocado slices, and a dollop of sour cream—hearty, crunchy, and full of bold Mexican flavor.
Order now
Small tortilla soup
$7.50
Small Sopa de Tortilla – A comforting cup of traditional Mexican tortilla soup, made with a rich tomato-chile broth and topped with crispy tortilla strips, avocado, melted cheese, and a touch of crema. Bold, warm flavors in a perfect starter size.
Order now
Large sopa de tortilla
$9.50
Large Sopa de Tortilla – A hearty bowl of traditional Mexican tortilla soup featuring a robust tomato and chile-infused broth. Generously topped with crispy tortilla strips, fresh avocado, melted cheese, and a swirl of crema. Bold, satisfying, and full of comforting flavor—perfect as a main course.
Order now
Ensalada de pollo
$17.00
Ensalada de Pollo – Juicy grilled chicken atop crisp mixed greens, fresh tomato slices, and creamy avocado. A simple yet flavorful Mexican-style salad that’s light, refreshing, and satisfying.
Order now
Birria
$21.00
Birria –  A traditional dish from the state of Jalisco, Birria features tender beef marinated in rich adobo spices and slow-cooked to perfection. Served with freshly chopped onions, cilantro, a wedge of lime, warm tortillas, and house-made hot sauce on the side. Bold, savory, and deeply flavorful—an authentic taste of Mexico.
Order now
A La Carte
Enchiladas
$21.00
Enchiladas – Soft corn tortillas rolled and filled with your choice of meat, cheese, or vegetables, then smothered in a rich, house-made red or green sauce. Topped with melted cheese and a touch of crema, and served with rice and beans. A classic, comforting Mexican favorite bursting with flavor.
Order now
Enchilada verde
$8.00
Enchilada Verde – Corn tortillas filled with your choice of chicken, cheese, or vegetables, rolled and topped with a tangy tomatillo green sauce. Finished with melted cheese, crema, and fresh cilantro. Served with rice and beans for a bright, flavorful Mexican classic.
Order now
Tostada
$8.00
Tostada – A crispy, flat corn tortilla layered with refried beans, your choice of Ground Beef, Chicken, or Picadillo, then topped with fresh lettuce, tomato, shredded cheese, sour cream, and sliced avocado. Crunchy, satisfying, and full of traditional Mexican flavor.
Order now
Chile relleno
$9.00
Chile Relleno – A roasted poblano pepper stuffed with melted cheese or your choice of picadillo, dipped in a light egg batter and fried to golden perfection. Topped with a savory tomato sauce and served with rice and beans. A classic, comforting dish full of bold, authentic Mexican flavor.
Order now
Fish tacos
$8.00
Fish Taco – Lightly battered and fried fish tucked into a warm corn tortilla, topped with fresh cabbage, pico de gallo, and a drizzle of creamy chipotle sauce. Served with lime on the side for a zesty, coastal-inspired bite. Crisp, fresh, and full of flavor.
Order now
Shrimp taco
$8.00
Shrimp Taco – Sautéed shrimp seasoned with Mexican spices, served in a warm corn tortilla and topped with shredded cabbage, fresh pico de gallo, and a creamy chipotle-lime sauce. A vibrant, flavorful taco with a perfect balance of spice and freshness
Order now
Tamale
$8.00
Tamale
A traditional Mexican favorite made with soft, steamed corn masa and your choice of Chicken, Pork, or Cheese, wrapped in a corn husk. Hearty, comforting, and full of authentic flavor.
Order now
Enchilada de mole
$8.00
Enchilada de Mole
Corn tortillas filled with your choice of chicken or cheese, smothered in rich, house-made mole sauce—a deep, complex blend of chiles, spices, and chocolate. Topped with sesame seeds, crema, and served with rice and beans. A bold and traditional Mexican classic.
Order now
Avocado tostada
$8.00
Avocado Tostada
A crispy corn tortilla layered with refried beans and topped with fresh sliced avocado, lettuce, tomato, shredded cheese, and a touch of sour cream. Light, creamy, and full of fresh, vibrant flavor
Order now
Ceviche tostada
$15.00
Ceviche Tostada
A crisp corn tostada topped with zesty citrus-marinated fish or shrimp mixed with tomato, onion, cilantro, and jalapeño. Finished with fresh avocado slices and a splash of lime. Bright, refreshing, and full of coastal Mexican flavor.
Order now
Hard shell taco
$7.00
Hard Shell Taco
A crunchy corn tortilla shell filled with your choice of Ground Beef, Chicken, or Picadillo, topped with shredded lettuce, diced tomato, and shredded cheese. A classic taco with bold flavor and satisfying crunch.
Order now
Chimichanga
$8.00
Chimichanga
A large flour tortilla filled with your choice of shredded beef, chicken, or picadillo, then deep-fried to a golden crisp. Topped with melted cheese, guacamole, sour cream, and served with rice and beans. A hearty, flavorful favorite with a crispy twist.
Order now
Street taco
$5.00
Street Taco
A single soft corn tortilla filled with your choice of Carne Asada, Al Pastor, Chicken, or Carnitas. Garnished with fresh cilantro and chopped onions, and served with lime and salsa on the side. A small taco with big, authentic flavor.
Order now
Quesabirria
$23.00
Quesabirria
A crispy, cheese-filled tortilla folded over tender, slow-cooked birria beef, grilled to perfection. Served with fresh onions, cilantro, and a side of rich consommé for dipping. Bold, savory, and irresistibly satisfying.
Order now
Fajitas
Sizzling fajitas
$29.00
Sizzling Fajitas
Your choice of Chicken, Steak, or a Combo, grilled with onions and bell peppers and served sizzling hot. Accompanied by rice, whole beans, guacamole, and sour cream. A flavorful and classic Mexican favorite served with warm tortillas.
Order now
Prawn fajita
$30.00
Prawn Fajita
White shrimp grilled with onions and bell peppers, then topped with a flavorful red sauce. Served with rice, whole beans, sour cream, and guacamole. A bold and savory seafood twist on the classic fajita.
Order now
Fajita supremas
$33.00
Fajita Supremas
A sizzling combination of chicken, steak, and prawn grilled with onions and bell peppers, all topped with a rich red sauce. Served with rice, whole beans, sour cream, and guacamole. A hearty and flavorful feast for fajita lovers.
Order now
House Specialities
El Talpense special
$49.00
El Talpense Special
A feast of bold flavors featuring juicy chunks of tender ribeye steak, marinated chicken, flaky fish, and prawns sautéed with vegetables—all smothered in a rich, house-made sauce designed to awaken even the most dormant taste buds. Served with a side of rice, beans, and fresh coleslaw for the perfect balance of flavor and satisfaction.
Order now
Two sopes
$26.00
Sopes Plate
Two thick, handmade corn sopes topped with your choice of Chicken, Picadillo, Carnitas, Chorizo, Al Pastor, or Steak. Each sope is layered with refried beans, lettuce, cheese, and sour cream. Served with a side of rice, beans, and fresh coleslaw for a hearty, traditional Mexican meal.
Order now
Pollo en crema
$26.00
A savory classic—tender strips of chicken sautéed with onions, bell peppers, and tomatoes, then simmered in our signature sour cream sauce made with a secret blend of spices. Served with fluffy rice, hearty beans, and crisp coleslaw for a satisfying, well-rounded meal. Let me know if you’d like a bilingual version or a different style!
Order now
Carne asada
$28.00
Carne Asada
Thinly sliced, broiler-grilled steak cooked to perfection, offering bold, smoky flavor in every bite. Served with traditional rice, hearty beans, and fresh pico de gallo for a classic, satisfying plate.
Let me know if you need this translated or adapted further!
Order now
Carnitas plate
$26.00
Carnitas
Slow-cooked pork that’s tender, juicy, and full of rich flavor. Served with rice, beans, crisp lettuce, and fresh tomato for a well-balanced, traditional plate.
Order now
Chile verde
$27.00
Chile Verde
Tender chunks of pork simmered in a flavorful tomatillo sauce with just the right touch of spice. Served with rice, beans, and crisp coleslaw for a hearty, authentic dis

El Tampico
A bold fusion from land and sea—juicy ribeye steak chunks and succulent prawns sautéed with fresh vegetables in a rich, zesty sauce crafted to awaken every taste bud. Served with rice, beans, and crisp coleslaw for the ultimate flavor-packed experience.

Steak a La Mexicana
$45.00
Steak a la Mexicana
Ribeye steak broiled to your preference, topped with grilled onions and served with fresh avocado slices and tomato. Accompanied by rice, beans, and crisp coleslaw for a true taste of Mexico.

Arroz con pollo

Tender chicken chunks sautéed in a savory special sauce with mushrooms, onions, and tomatoes. Served over a bed of rice and topped with melted Jack cheese for a rich, comforting dish.

Pollo Mexican style
26.00

Strips of tender chicken sautéed with onions, tomatoes, and bell peppers in a bold, spicy Mexican red sauce. Served with rice, beans, and crisp coleslaw for a vibrant and satisfying meal.

$29.00
Camarones al Mojo de Ajo
Prawns sautéed in butter and slowly simmered in a rich, garlicky sauce that’s full of bold flavor. Served with rice, beans, and crisp coleslaw for a hearty and satisfying meal.

Succulent prawns sautéed with mushrooms, onions, and bell peppers in a savory, ranch-style tomato sauce. Served with rice, beans, and crisp coleslaw for a flavorful and hearty seafood dish.

Two fish tacos

Two shrimp tacos

Cancun platter

Vegan Nachos

Grilled flour or corn tortilla filled with melted vegan cheese, sautéed bell peppers, onions, and mushrooms. Served with a side of fresh guacamole for a flavorful, plant-based twist on a classic favorite.

$2.75

Jarritos

Horchata

Horchata

Aguas Frescas

Crisp, smooth, and perfectly chilled—whether you prefer a light lager or a rich, dark cerveza, we’ve got something to pair with every dish.
Order now
Draft Beers
$7.00
Enjoy a refreshing pour from our rotating draft taps featuring:
Blue Moon – A smooth Belgian-style wheat ale with hints of orange and coriander.
Lagunitas IPA – A bold, hoppy India Pale Ale with citrus and pine notes.
Dos Equis Amber – A rich, smooth Vienna-style lager with subtle roasted malt.
Modelo Especial – A crisp, well-balanced Mexican lager with a clean finish.
Served ice-cold and full of flavor—perfect with any dish on our menu.
Order now
Draft Pitcher
$23.00
Share the good times with a chilled pitcher of your favorite draft! Choose from:
Blue Moon – Smooth and citrusy Belgian-style wheat ale.
Lagunitas IPA – Bold, hoppy, and full of West Coast character.
Dos Equis Amber – A rich, malty lager with a toasty finish.
Modelo Especial – Crisp, clean Mexican lager with a smooth taste.
Perfect for the table—just right for pairing with appetizers, tacos, or watching the game
Order now
Corona – Non Alcoholic
$5.00
Order now
Desserts
Sopapillas
$8.00
Sopapillas – Light, golden-fried Mexican pastries, served warm and dusted with cinnamon sugar. Crispy on the outside, soft and airy inside—perfectly paired with honey or chocolate drizzle for a sweet finish to your meal.
Order now
Mexican Flan
$9.00
Mexican Flan – A smooth, creamy caramel custard topped with rich golden syrup. This traditional dessert offers a melt-in-your-mouth texture and a perfect balance of sweetness in every bite.
Order now
Vanilla Ice Cream
$4.50
Vanilla Ice Cream – A classic scoop of smooth, creamy vanilla ice cream made with real vanilla beans. Perfect on its own or as a sweet pairing with any dessert
Order now
Mexican Churros
$8.00
Mexican Churros – Crispy, golden sticks of fried dough coated in cinnamon sugar. Served warm with your choice of rich chocolate or creamy caramel dipping sauce. A sweet, crunchy favorite!
Order now
Churro cheesecake
$9.00
Order now

French Fries

Sweet Potato Fries

Rice & Black Beans
Fluffy rice served with savory black beans, seasoned with Cholita's blend of herbs and spices for a deliciously satisfying side
Tostones con Picadillo
Crispy tostones topped with flavorful picadillo, featuring seasoned ground beef and a blend of herbs, served with a side of zesty dipping sauce for a delightful treat
Plantains
Sweet, golden plantains fried to perfection, offering a deliciously caramelized exterior and a tender, flavorful interior
Rice & Pinto Beans
Fluffy rice served with hearty pinto beans, seasoned with Cholita's blend of herbs and spices for a comforting and delicious side
Chips & Salsa
Crispy tortilla chips served with a vibrant, fresh salsa made from ripe tomatoes, onions, and cilantro, perfect for dipping and snacking
Sm Black Beans
Savory black beans slow-cooked with spices, creating a rich and flavorful side that's perfect for complementing any dish
Yuca Frita
Crispy yuca fries, golden and perfectly fried, offering a deliciously crunchy exterior and a soft, fluffy interior
Sm Pinto Beans
Savory pinto beans, seasoned to perfection and slow-cooked for rich flavor, making a hearty and delicious side for any meal
Chips
Crispy tortilla chips, lightly salted and perfect for snacking or dipping into your favorite salsas and guacamole
Guacamole
Creamy guacamole, vibrant and fresh, blending ripe avocados with zesty lime, cilantro, and a hint of spice for a smooth, flavorful dip
Sm Organic Salad
Fresh organic salad, crisp and colorful, with a mix of garden greens, juicy tomatoes, and crunchy cucumbers, drizzled in a light, zesty dressing for a refreshing bite
Sm Rice
Fluffy, perfectly cooked rice seasoned with a hint of flavor, making a light and satisfying side for any meal
Pico de Gallo
Fresh pico de gallo made with ripe tomatoes, onions, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime, offering a vibrant and zesty accompaniment for your favorite dishes
Desserts
Maizena de Coco
Coconut maizena, light and fluffy, offering a subtly sweet flavor with a hint of tropical richness
Churros
Golden churros, crispy outside and soft inside, coated in cinnamon sugar for a warm, sweet treat perfect for dipping
Aguas Frescas
Mango Passionfruit Agua
Refreshing mango passionfruit agua, blending sweet mango and tangy passionfruit for a thirst-quenching drink
Limeade Agua
Zesty limeade agua, tangy and refreshing, combining freshly squeezed lime juice with a hint of sweetness for the perfect thirst-quencher
Strawberry Agua
Refreshing strawberry agua, sweet and fruity, made with ripe strawberries for a deliciously fresh and thirst-quenching drink
Blackberry Agua

Mango Strawberry Agua

Mango Strawberry Agua
Refreshing mango strawberry agua, a perfect blend of sweet mango and ripe strawberries for a deliciously fruity, thirst-quenching drink
Blackberry Strawberry Agua

Zesty limeade blackberry agua, combining tangy lime with sweet blackberries for a refreshing and flavorful thirst-quencher
Limeade Mango Agua
Zesty limeade mango agua, a vibrant mix of tangy lime and sweet mango for a refreshing and tropical thirst-quencher
Limeade Strawberry Agua
Zesty limeade strawberry agua, blending tangy lime with sweet strawberries for a refreshing and delicious drink
Beer
Modelo Negra
A dark Mexican beer, offers smooth roasted malt flavors with hints of caramel, making it a rich and refreshing choice
IPA
Bold and hoppy, delivers a punch of citrus and pine flavors with a crisp finish, making it a favorite among craft beer enthusiasts
Modelo Especial
A crisp and refreshing Mexican lager, features light malt sweetness and a hint of hops, making it the perfect choice for any occasion
Pacifico
A light and refreshing Mexican lager, offers a smooth, crisp taste with subtle hints of citrus and a clean finish, making it ideal for warm days
Corona
A light and crisp Mexican lager, features mild malt flavors with a hint of sweetness, perfect with a wedge of lime for a refreshing twist
tecate
A classic Mexican lager, is light and refreshing, offering a smooth taste with subtle malt notes, making it a great choice for any occasion
Dos XX
A well-known Mexican lager, is smooth and refreshing, featuring a balanced flavor profile with mild malt sweetness and a crisp finish
Wine & Cocktails
Margarita
A classic cocktail, combines tangy lime juice, smooth tequila, and a hint of orange liqueur, served over ice with a salted rim for a refreshing and zesty drink
Sangria
A fruity and refreshing cocktail, blends red wine with fresh fruits and a splash of citrus juice, creating a sweet and vibrant drink perfect for any occasion
Frozen Pina Colada
A creamy tropical blend of coconut cream, pineapple juice, and rum, served icy cold for a sweet and refreshing escape in every sip
Frozen Paloma
A frosty mix of tequila, fresh grapefruit juice, and a touch of lime, offers a tangy and refreshing citrus burst in every sip
Sodas

A classic soda, is bold and refreshing, with a perfect balance of sweetness and fizz that delivers a crisp, satisfying taste
Squirt
A zesty grapefruit soda, is crisp and refreshing, offering a tangy citrus flavor with just the right amount of sweetness and fizz
Diet Coke
A sugar-free soda, offers the classic Coke flavor with a light, crisp taste, perfect for those seeking a refreshing option with no calories

Topo Chico
